title: Trevor Noah Sues Famous Hospital & Doctor For Medical Malpractice
description:
Trevor Noah is late night’s resident funny guy but he’s not laughing after filing a medical malpractice lawsuit against a famous hospital and surgeon for allegedly botching a surgery and leaving him in a lot of pain. Tune in as we get into the facts and break down his lawsuit.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
